wikipedia_page.main: Michael John James George Robert Howard, 21st Earl of Suffolk & 14th Earl of Berkshire (born 27 March 1935), styled Viscount Andover until 1941, is an English peer. He succeeded his father, Charles Howard, 20th Earl of Suffolk, in 1941, when the latter was killed by a bomb he was attempting to defuse. Howard attended Winchester College but left after a year.

response: * Michael Howard, 21st Earl of Suffolk (born 1935), English peer

response: |7.||The Earl of Suffolk||(1603)||25px||Michael Howard, 21st Earl of Suffolk||Also Earl of Berkshire (E 1626) - see below
He married, secondly, the photographer Anita Fuglesang, formerly the wife of Michael Howard, 21st Earl of Suffolk.
